summary: A modern, professional business website for Codetykoons, a software development company offering web development, e-commerce, web applications, SEO, maintenance, and API integration services. Multi-page site with Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Pricing (optional), and Contact pages. Clean tech-focused design with blue/white palette, smooth animations. Node.js backend with compatible frontend.
architectural_notes: Frontend: Compatible with Node.js (likely Express + EJS/React/Vue)
Design: Blue and white color palette, clean modern tech-focused UI
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional tech company hero background with blue gradient and geometric patterns (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Modern abstract illustration representing custom website development service (service-web-dev.dim_400x300.png)
- Modern abstract illustration representing e-commerce development service (service-ecommerce.dim_400x300.png)
- Modern abstract illustration representing web applications service (service-web-apps.dim_400x300.png)
- Modern abstract illustration representing SEO optimization service (service-seo.dim_400x300.png)
- Modern abstract illustration representing website maintenance service (service-maintenance.dim_400x300.png)
- Modern abstract illustration representing API integration service (service-api.dim_400x300.png)
- Codetykoons company logo with modern tech aesthetic in blue and white (logo.dim_200x60.png)
- Portfolio project mockup showcasing professional website design example 1 (portfolio-1.dim_600x400.png)
- Portfolio project mockup showcasing professional website design example 2 (portfolio-2.dim_600x400.png)
- Portfolio project mockup showcasing professional website design example 3 (portfolio-3.dim_600x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Home page with hero section containing headline 'We Build Powerful Digital Solutions', subheading explaining how Codetykoons helps businesses grow online, and CTA button labeled 'Get a Free Consultation'

Add Services overview section to Home page listing the six core services: Custom Website Development, E-commerce Website Development, Web Applications, SEO Optimization, Website Maintenance & Support, and API Integration
Add Why Choose Us section to Home page highlighting Codetykoons' value propositions and competitive advantages
Add Portfolio preview section to Home page showcasing selected completed projects
Add Testimonials section to Home page with client feedback and reviews
Add Contact call-to-action section to Home page encouraging visitors to reach out
Add Footer to Home page with social media links
Create About Us page explaining that Codetykoons is dedicated to building scalable, secure, and high-performance web solutions

Create Services page showcasing all six services (Custom Website Development, E-commerce Website Development, Web Applications, SEO Optimization, Website Maintenance & Support, API Integration) with detailed descriptions
Create Portfolio page to display completed projects and case studies
Create optional Pricing page to display service pricing tiers and packages
Create Contact Us page with form fields for Name, Email, Phone, and Project Details, and include email and WhatsApp contact options
Implement clean, modern, tech-focused design with professional and trustworthy aesthetic using blue and white color palette throughout all pages
Implement minimal but bold sections with smooth scroll and modern animations across all pages
Ensure all pages are mobile responsive with fast loading and modern UI optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
Implement SEO optimization with professional business tone in content throughout all pages
Implement navigation structure allowing users to move between Home, About Us, Services, Portfolio, Pricing, and Contact Us pages

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage with hero section, services overview, Why Choose Us, portfolio preview, testimonials, CTA, and footer with social links
About Us page explaining Codetykoons' mission to build scalable, secure, high-performance web solutions
Services page showcasing Custom Website Development, E-commerce, Web Applications, SEO, Maintenance & Support, API Integration
Portfolio page to showcase completed projects
Pricing page (optional) to display service pricing tiers
Contact Us page with form (Name, Email, Phone, Project Details) and email/WhatsApp contact options
SEO optimization, mobile responsive layout, smooth scroll and modern animations
Store contact form submissions in backend with fields for name, email, phone, and project details
